textContent:
On syllabuses, you can know only what students must NOT do, for example, if you do not hand in the essays by the deadline, you cannot pass the course.
I am always confused when I read sentences like this because I fear that I might forget doing what have influence on my grade.
So, now I have decided to focus on what I MUST do. Doing so, I am now very optimistic that I have to do only this.
You also try it.
title: How to avoid forgetting something important
textContentHtml:
On syllabuses, you can know only what students must NOT do, for example, if you do not hand in the essays by the deadline, you cannot pass the course.

I am always confused when I read sentences like this because I fear that I might forget doing what have influence on my grade.

So, now I have decided to focus on what I MUST do. Doing so, I am now very optimistic that I have to do only this.

You also try it.
